com.darwinreforged.server.core.events.util

Class Bus

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.darwinreforged.server.core.events.util.Bus

  • public final class Bus
extends java.lang.Object
    Basic event bus.
    Author:
    Matt, Andy Li

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void post(Event event)
      Posts an event to all registered listeners.

      Registers all listener methods on object for receiving events.

    • Method Detail

      • subscribe

        public static void subscribe(java.lang.Object object,
                             java.lang.invoke.MethodHandles.Lookup lookup)
                      throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                             java.lang.SecurityException
        Registers all listener methods on object for receiving events.
        Parameters:
        object - object whose listener methods should be registered
        lookup - the Lookup object used in MethodHandle creation
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if there's an invalid listener method on the object, or the object doesn't have any listener methods
        java.lang.SecurityException - if a security manager denied access to the declared methods of the class of the object, or the provided lookup object cannot access one of the listener method found in the class
        Since:
        1.3
        See Also:
        EventBus#subscribe(Object, MethodHandles.Lookup), MethodHandles.Lookup

      • subscribe

        public static void subscribe(java.lang.Object object)
                      throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                             java.lang.SecurityException
        Registers all listener methods on object for receiving events.
        Parameters:
        object - object whose listener methods should be registered
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if there's an invalid listener method on the object, or the object doesn't have any listener methods
        java.lang.SecurityException - if a security manager denied access to the declared methods of the class of the object, or the default lookup object cannot access one of the listener method found in the class
        See Also:
        EventBus#subscribe(Object)

      • unsubscribe

        public static void unsubscribe(java.lang.Object object)
        Unregisters all listener methods on the object.
        Parameters:
        object - object whose listener methods should be unregistered
        See Also:
        EventBus#unsubscribe(Object)

      • post

        public static void post(Event event)
        Posts an event to all registered listeners.
        Parameters:
        event - event to post
